00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Collections;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 
00027 using NyFolder;
00028 using NyFolder.GUI;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.DownloadManager {
00035     public class DownloadViewer : FrameViewer {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Events
00038         // ============================================
00039 
00040         // ============================================
00041         // PROTECTED Members
00042         // ============================================
00043 
00044         // ============================================
00045         // PRIVATE Members
00046         // ============================================
00047 
00048         // ============================================
00049         // PUBLIC Constructors
00050         // ============================================
00051         public DownloadViewer() {
00052             Protocol.DownloadManager.ReceivedPart += new BlankEventHandler(OnReceivedPart);
00053             Protocol.DownloadManager.Finished += new BlankEventHandler(OnFinished);
00054             Protocol.DownloadManager.Aborted += new BlankEventHandler(OnAborted);
00055             Protocol.DownloadManager.Added += new BlankEventHandler(OnAdded);
00056         }
00057 
00058         ~DownloadViewer() {
00059             Protocol.DownloadManager.ReceivedPart -= new BlankEventHandler(OnReceivedPart);
00060             Protocol.DownloadManager.Finished -= new BlankEventHandler(OnFinished);
00061             Protocol.DownloadManager.Aborted -= new BlankEventHandler(OnAborted);
00062             Protocol.DownloadManager.Added -= new BlankEventHandler(OnAdded);
00063         }
00064 
00065         // ============================================
00066         // PUBLIC Methods
00067         // ============================================
00069         public void Clear() {
00070             lock (progressObjects) {
00071                 Hashtable rm = new Hashtable();             
00072                 foreach (FileReceiver fileRecv in progressObjects.Keys) {
00073                     FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileRecv];
00074                     if (obj.Finished == true) rm.Add(fileRecv, obj);
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 foreach (FileReceiver fileRecv in rm.Keys) {
00078                     progressObjects.Remove(fileRecv);
00079                     vbox.Remove((FileProgressObject) rm[fileRecv]);
00080                 }
00081                 rm.Clear();
00082                 rm = null;
00083             }
00084         }
00085 
00086         // ============================================
00087         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00088         // ============================================
00089         private void OnAdded (object sender) {
00090         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00091             FileReceiver fileRecv = sender as FileReceiver;
00092 
00093             FileProgressObject obj = new FileProgressObject();
00094             obj.Delete += new BlankEventHandler(OnButtonDelete);
00095 
00096             // Setup Image
00097             string ext = FileUtils.GetExtension(fileRecv.MyDiskName);
00098             obj.Image = StockIcons.GetFileIconPixbuf(TextUtils.UpFirstChar(ext));
00099 
00100             // Set Transfer Info
00101             SetTransferInfo(obj, fileRecv);
00102             
00103             // Set Info
00104             UserInfo userInfo = fileRecv.Peer.Info as UserInfo;
00105             obj.SetName(fileRecv.Name, userInfo.Name);
00106 
00107             // Add Update
00108             progressObjects.Add(fileRecv, obj);
00109             vbox.PackStart(obj, false, false, 2);
00110             obj.ShowAll();
00111         });
00112         }
00113 
00114         private void OnAborted (object sender) {
00115         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00116             try {
00117                 FileReceiver fileRecv = sender as FileReceiver;
00118                 FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileRecv];
00119                 SetTransferInfo(obj, fileRecv);
00120                 obj.Info += " <b>ABORTED</b>";
00121                 obj.Finished = true;
00122             } catch (Exception e) {
00123                 Debug.Log("Download Viewer Abort: {0}", e.Message);
00124             }
00125         });
00126         }
00127 
00128         private void OnFinished (object sender) {
00129         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00130             try {
00131                 FileReceiver fileRecv = sender as FileReceiver;
00132                 FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileRecv];
00133                 obj.ProgressBar.Visible = false;
00134                 obj.Info = "<b>(Finished)</b>";
00135                 obj.Finished = true;
00136             } catch (Exception e) {
00137                 Debug.Log("Download Viewer Finished: {0}", e.Message);
00138             }
00139         });
00140         }
00141 
00142         private void OnReceivedPart (object sender) {
00143         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00144             try {
00145                 FileReceiver fileRecv = sender as FileReceiver;
00146                 FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileRecv];
00147                 if (obj == null) {
00148                     OnAdded(sender);
00149                     obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileRecv];
00150                 } else if (obj.Finished == true) {
00151                     return;
00152                 }
00153                 SetTransferInfo(obj, fileRecv);
00154             } catch (Exception e) {
00155                 Debug.Log("Download Viewer Received Part: {0}", e.Message);
00156             }
00157         });
00158         }
00159 
00160         private void OnButtonDelete (object sender) {
00161         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00162             FileProgressObject obj = sender as FileProgressObject;
00163             obj.Delete -= new BlankEventHandler(OnButtonDelete);
00164 
00165             FileReceiver fileReceiver = null;
00166             lock (progressObjects) {
00167                 foreach (FileReceiver fileRecv in progressObjects.Keys) {
00168                     if (progressObjects[fileRecv] == obj) {
00169                         fileReceiver = fileRecv;
00170                         break;
00171                     }
00172                 }
00173 
00174                 if (obj.Finished != true)
00175                     fileReceiver.Abort();
00176 
00177                 progressObjects.Remove(fileReceiver);
00178                 vbox.Remove(obj);
00179             }
00180         });
00181         }
00182 
00183         // ============================================
00184         // PRIVATE Methods
00185         // ============================================
00186         private void SetTransferInfo (FileProgressObject obj, FileReceiver fr) {
00187             if (obj != null) {
00188                 int percent = fr.ReceivedPercent;
00189                 if (percent < 0) percent = 0;
00190                 obj.SetTransferInfo(fr.SavedSize, fr.Size, percent);
00191             }
00192         }
00193 
00194         // ============================================
00195         // PUBLIC Properties
00196         // ============================================
00197     }
00198 }
